title: Saloio
content:
Anyone any idea for that "Saloio" logo font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015175916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/saloio_03_4606.jpg)
author: flabrea

comments.content:
Don't know this one. Could be a custom lettering.  
Alternatives for the time being: [Cronos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015175916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/cronos), [Cosmos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015175916/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/cosmos), [Flavour](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015175916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/flavour), [Tasty](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015175916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/tasty)

Thanks Jodie. The 2 /o look different so it might be hand-drawn. Funny thing is it also looks different from [Saloio official logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015175916/http:/www.queijosaloio.pt/).
